code: import{Bar,Line}from"react-chartjs-2";import Chart from'chart.js/auto';import'./Graph.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var colors=["#D291BC","#B8DBD0","#FFAF68","#E8A68E","9BB8ED","A39FE1","B3D9B2"];function createOptions(arr){var options={maintainAspectRatio:true,responsive:true,plugins:{legend:{position:"top"},title:{display:true,text:arr[0][0],font:{size:30,family:"Lato"}}},scales:{y:{title:{display:true,text:arr[0][2],font:{size:15}}},x:{title:{display:true,text:arr[0][1],font:{size:15}}}}};return options;}function createLabels(arr){if(arr!=undefined){var labels=[];for(var i=2;i<arr.length;i++){if(arr[i][0].length!=0)labels.push(arr[i][0]);}return labels;}}function createDataSets(arr){var datasetsArray=[];for(var i=1;i<arr[1].length;i++){var dataArray=[];for(var j=2;j<arr.length;j++){if(arr[j][i]!=undefined)dataArray.push(arr[j][i]);}var datasetObj={label:arr[1][i],data:dataArray,borderColor:"#000",borderWidth:"1.5",backgroundColor:colors[i],hoverBorderWidth:"2"};datasetsArray.push(datasetObj);}return datasetsArray;}var Graph=function Graph(props){var actualData={labels:createLabels(props.chartData),datasets:createDataSets(props.chartData),backgroundColor:colors[0]};if(props.type==="line"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"graph-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{className:"graph",data:actualData,options:createOptions(props.chartData),radius:"50"})});}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"graph-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{className:"graph",data:actualData,options:createOptions(props.chartData),radius:"50"})});}};export default Graph;
